text: Amoebic encephalitis or amoebic meningoencephalitis may refer to several potentially fatal diseases that are infections of the central nervous system by free-living amoebae, often referred to in the media as a "brain-eating amoeba" infection: *Granulomatous amoebic encephalitis *Naegleriasis, also known as primary amoebic meningoencephalitis
title: Amoebic encephalitis
